Exceptions¶

exception pylol.exceptions.APIFailure(msg, path, url)[source]¶

Thrown when an API request returns success = false

exception pylol.exceptions.APIInvalidData(data)[source]¶

Thrown when the API returns invalid/corrupted JSON data

exception pylol.exceptions.APIInvalidRegion(region)[source]¶

Thrown when an invalid region is specified during an API query

exception pylol.exceptions.APISummonerIDNotFound(sid, region)[source]¶

Thrown when requesting info on a summoner ID that doesn’t exist

exception pylol.exceptions.APISummonerNotFound(name, region)[source]¶

Thrown when requesting info on a summoner that doesn’t exist

exception pylol.exceptions.APISummonerNotInTeams(sid, region)[source]¶

Thrown when requesting team info on a summoner that isn’t part of any teams

exception pylol.exceptions.PylolException[source]¶

Base class for all exceptions generated by PyLoL
